about_the_game:
Embark on an Odyssey, through a captivating 2D RPG set in a hand-drawn world ravaged by the absence of its god-like creators. Play as Codrin, an unwitting mage, who journeys through the post-apocalyptic realm of Dremid'ir, mastering volatile magic, confronting unimaginable creatures, and exploring diverse landscapes — from ruined cities to deep caverns.

KEY FEATURES:




Forge an Unlikely Alliance:
Odyssey offers a heavily story and character driven adventure, bringing together unlikely friends, from novice sorcerers, angelic knights, and even dangerous scavengers together on a journey to save the world.


Dynamic and Tactical Combat:
Immerse yourself in fast-paced, seamless combat where enemies roam freely. Combine party members strategically, exploiting their synergies. Outsmart foes who adapt and plan, creating an engaging challenge.



Personalized Character Progression:
Shape your characters with precise attribute and skill point allocation. The unfolding narrative responds to your choices of companions, adding layers to the story.

Perilous Open World Exploration:
Brave the Ruins of the Old World, confronting mutant monsters, and more. Engage in quests that evolve characters and unravel the world's mysteries. Unearth hidden treasures by deciphering ancient notes and maps, revealing the secrets within.

short_description: In the desolate realm of Dremid'ir, abandoned by god-like architects, a fragile world teeters on the edge of oblivion. Unearth secrets in ancient ruins, and navigate lost civilizations in this danger-fraught 2d RPG!
